courses.name: HTML
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, the standard markup language for creating web pages.

courses.name: CSS
courses.description: Learn how to style your web pages using CSS, the language for describing the presentation of Web pages.

courses.name: JavaScript
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, the programming language of the Web.

courses.name: ReactJS
courses.description: Learn how to build user interfaces using ReactJS, a popular JavaScript library.

courses.name: MongoDB
courses.description: Learn how to use MongoDB, a NoSQL database for modern web applications.

courses.name: NodeJS
courses.description: Learn how to build scalable network applications using NodeJS, a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.
